text: "Dead Flowers" is a 2009 song by country artist Miranda Lambert. It is the leading single from her third studio album Revolution. It went to number 37 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs chart in the United States. It was nominated for a Grammy Award in 2010. ==Track listing== Category:2009 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:Country ballads Category:Miranda Lambert songs
title: Dead Flowers (Miranda Lambert song)
